detail_desc: Tailored shorts in an airy weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with an elasticated rib-knit drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short dress in a lightly crêped weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Short sleeves, a flap chest pocket and a narrow tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist that has gathered elastication at the back and pleats at the front. Discreet pockets in the side seams, a low crotch and wide, flared legs with slits at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in cotton piqué with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Satin ties. One in a solid colour and one patterned. Width 6.5 cm.
Cardigan in a soft knit with a wrapover front with visible ties at one side and concealed ties at the other. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Relaxed-fit top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wrapover shawl collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless flared bouse woven in an airy cotton blend. V neck, buttons down the double-layered front and gathers at the seams. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, checked skirt in a textured weave with a high waist and visible zip in one side. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved dress in fine-knit organic cotton with a hole pattern at the top and gently flared skirt. Round, frill-trimmed neckline and buttons at the back of the neck.
Blouse in an airy jacquard weave with a small frilled collar, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with a narrow, buttoned cuff. Unlined.
Fully lined, 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Shirt in a soft organic cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and double-layered yoke. Open chest pocket, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Platform boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Decorative welt seams and chunky soles. Platform front 4 cm, heel 5 cm.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey.
T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with an interactive motif.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and jersey-lined, wrapover hood. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal hair clips decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length 9 cm.
High-waisted jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flared legs.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Flared trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, back pockets and slim-cut legs with sewn-in creases and flared hems.
Long-sleeved cardigan in stretch imitation suede with a shawl collar and straight-cut hem. No buttons.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with a polo neck, concealed press-studs on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Wide, V-neck sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with decorative straps at the neckline, short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Fully lined swimsuit with lightly padded cups and a V-neck with frill trims that continue over the shoulders. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.
5-pocket trousers in stretch corduroy with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim, ankle-length legs.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in a modal and cotton weave with a round neckline that has an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tie detail at the hem. Unlined.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Straight-cut top in an airy viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Blouse in a soft textured cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and frill-trimmed cap sleeves.
Hat in a soft, textured-knit wool blend with a thermal fleece trim on the inside.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.
Sleeveless shirt dress in a viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a gently rounded hem.
Easy pull-on trousers in cotton twill. Relaxed fit with an elasticated waist, front and back pockets, and tapered legs.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Ribbed leggings with soft elastication at the waist.
Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a double-layered hood, gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft fine knit with a textured-knit section at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in airy, patterned satin with a boat neck and long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs.
Suede biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with a press-stud. Zipped pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Short skirt in an airy weave with wide smocking at the waist and tiers to the hem. Unlined.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in patterned jersey with long sleeves.

Checked suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and a zip fly with a button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit. Fleece lining.
Turban in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Short dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck and butterfly sleeves. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, an elasticated seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt, and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Thin metal Alice band decorated with plastic beads.
Short T-shirt in soft jersey with a trim in a contrasting colour at the neckline and sleeves.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elastication around the top.
Fully lined bikini top with a racer back and wide elastic hem.
Jacket in sturdy jersey with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and jersey-lined, wrapover hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Blouse in soft, double-weave organic cotton with buttons down the back and long raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Corset in mesh and lace with a push-up bra. Underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the front.
Trousers in a sturdy, slightly stretchy cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a press-stud and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Weekend bag with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap, two handles and a zip at the top and three inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 19x38x44 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with an open, printed chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and draping at the front.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with a decorative pompom trim and embroidery. V-neck, round, spaghetti shoulder straps, a seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Lined.
Oversized jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Round metal studs. Diameter approx. 3 cm.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Gloves in a felted wool blend with ribbing at the top and an adjustable tab with press-studs. Fleece lining.
